front.title: AIEE Standard for Potheads
front.abstract: This standard covers all types of indoor and outdoor potheads for alternating-current circuits (see Table 3 for voltage ratings). So-called through-type potheads are not within the scope of this Standard. Potheads and component parts shall be capable of withstanding the tests specified in this Standard, when mounted for testing ill accordance with arrangements specified in the Test Code (Appendix I).
